name: 呂良賜
objective:
課程內容主要介紹無機化學研究過程中﹐所使用的各種物理方法。首先介紹光譜學之基本原理。隨後將較深入的探討應用在無機化學與固體材料上的各種光譜技術。包括：各種吸收光譜、核磁共振光譜、電子順磁共振光譜、Ｘ光吸收光譜及Ｘ光繞射等應用於化學之常用分析技術﹐也都包括在課程討論範圍之內。內容包括化學鍵、分子振動、過渡金屬化合物的電子光譜、原子簇化合物及晶體結構。
The course content mainly introduces various physical methods used in the research process of inorganic chemistry. First introduce the basic principles of spectroscopy. Later, various spectroscopic techniques applied to inorganic chemistry and solid materials will be discussed in depth. Including: various absorption spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, electron paramagnetic resonance spectroscopy, X-ray absorption spectroscopy and X-ray diffraction and other commonly used analytical techniques in chemistry, which are also included in the scope of the course discussion. The content includes chemical bonds, molecular vibrations, electronic spectra of transition metal compounds, cluster compounds and crystal structures.
